title: Volcom Men's Regular Nailer Relaxed Fit Denim Jean Pant
description: Relaxed straight fit with a 18" leg opening
VOLCOM WATER AWARE - Omit softener / combine desize & ozone washes to limit water usage
VOLCOM STONE MADE - Superior Stretch with improved recovery
Deep indigo rigid denim with light thigh sanding, front and back leg creases
Signature Volcom Brand Jeans styling and details

Volcom was founded in 1991 as America’s First Boarding Company and combined the cultures of skateboarding, surfing, snowboarding, music and art through our ‘Youth Against Establishment’ lens. This same energy continues to this day as we unite diverse lifestyles with our ‘True To This’ battle cry.
